entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
